sys_metadata_link.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sys_script_include">
    <sys_script_include action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE">
        <access>package_private</access>
        <active>true</active>
        <api_name>global.GlobalRankHelper</api_name>
        <caller_access/>
        <client_callable>false</client_callable>
        <description/>
        <name>GlobalRankHelper</name>
        <script><![CDATA[var GlobalRankHelper = Class.create();
GlobalRankHelper.prototype = {
    initialize: function() {},
    populateGlobalRank: function(tableName, column, batchSize, startIndex, blockSize, encodedQuery, orderByField, orderDesc) {
        var sequencer = new SNC.AgileRankSequencer(tableName, column);
        var gr = new GlideRecord("rank_configuration");
        gr.addQuery("table", tableName);
        gr.addQuery("column", column);
        gr.query();
        if (gr.next()) {
            if (JSUtil.nil(startIndex))
                startIndex = gr.getValue("last_index");
            if (JSUtil.nil(blockSize))
                blockSize = gr.getValue("block_size");
        }
        sequencer.populateGlobalRank(batchSize, startIndex, blockSize, encodedQuery, orderByField, orderDesc);
    },

    type: 'GlobalRankHelper'
};]]></script>
        <sys_class_name>sys_script_include</sys_class_name>
        <sys_created_by>admin</sys_created_by>
        <sys_created_on>2019-08-19 22:38:49</sys_created_on>
        <sys_id>9429413ab35333003fa1e6e316a8dc84</sys_id>
        <sys_mod_count>2</sys_mod_count>
        <sys_name>GlobalRankHelper</sys_name>
        <sys_package display_value="Agile Development 2.0" source="com.snc.sdlc.agile.2.0">c2159f242fc10110d8a4d5f62799b627</sys_package>
        <sys_policy/>
        <sys_scope display_value="Global">global</sys_scope>
        <sys_update_name>sys_script_include_9429413ab35333003fa1e6e316a8dc84</sys_update_name>
        <sys_updated_by>admin</sys_updated_by>
        <sys_updated_on>2019-08-21 16:51:42</sys_updated_on>
        <u_script_length>830</u_script_length>
    </sys_script_include>
</record_update>
